text:
@Jacob_Rees_Mogg The safest place for a child is in a #Covid19-infected car as his dad conducts a 50k #BarnardCastleEyeTest to see if his failing eyesight will kill someone.

The safest place for MPs is in the #HouseOfCovid that Jacob built. It's the only place with working #TrackAndTrace.
